code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.post('/api/auth/login',{email,password});localStorage.setItem('token',res.data.token);navigate('/dashboard');}catch(err){alert('Login failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Login to Miki"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Email",onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Password",type:"password",onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleLogin,children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{onClick:()=>navigate('/forgot-password'),children:"Forgot Password?"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{onClick:()=>navigate('/register'),children:"New?
